tool_description: Datamo is a RESTful API that provides extensive electric and combustion vehicle specification data.
name: Datamo
title: Datamo

api_list.name: /specs/v1/tier1
api_list.description:
Pull requested vehicle data for specific field parameters. Tier 1 allows the following to be queried by:  
1. make
2. model

At least one query parameter is required for a successful call.

required_parameters.name: make
required_parameters.description: At least 1 query parameter is required to make a successful call. For purpose of testing through the RapidAPI interface, this is required. Normally, only one of any additional query parameters is required. i.e. make, model, engineType, ...

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: The field you would like to sort by.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: The sort order of the specified field.

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: At least 1 query parameter is required to make a successful call.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page of data returned, starting with index 1 (Default 1)

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: The number of entries returned per query. The default is 10 per page. The max per page is 250.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Over 100+ returnable fields including: make, model, engineType, bodyType, msrp, etc. See the Datamo website for a full list. Leave blank to return all fields.

api_list.name: /specs/v1/tier3
api_list.description:
Pull requested vehicle data for specific field parameters. Tier 3 access grants to filter by any of the 100+ fields in the database

At least one query parameter is required for a successful call.

required_parameters.name: make
required_parameters.description: At least 1 query parameter is required to make a successful call. For purpose of testing through the RapidAPI interface, this is required. Normally, only one of any additional query parameters is required. i.e. make, model, engineType, ...

optional_parameters.name: bodyType
optional_parameters.description: At least 1 query parameter is required to make a successful call.

optional_parameters.name: msrp
optional_parameters.description: At least 1 query parameter is required to make a successful call.

optional_parameters.name: engineType
optional_parameters.description: At least 1 query parameter is required to make a successful call.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page of data returned, starting with index 1 (Default 1).

optional_parameters.name: search
optional_parameters.description: Text search by the make, model, or year.

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: At least 1 query parameter is required to make a successful call.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: The sort order of the specified field.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: The field you would like to sort by.

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: The number of entries returned per query. The default is 10 per page. The max per page is 250.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Over 100+ returnable fields including: make, model, year, engineType, bodyType, etc. See the Datamo website for a full list. Leave blank to return all fields.

api_list.name: /specs/v1/getMakes
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all the vehicle makes available, as an array of strings.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://datamo.p.rapidapi.com/specs/v1/getMakes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datamo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://datamo.p.rapidapi.com/specs/v1/getMakes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "datamo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /specs/v1/tier2
api_list.description:
Pull requested vehicle data for specific field parameters. Tier 2 allows the following to be queried by:  
1. make
2. model
3. engineType
4. bodyType

At least one query parameter is required for a successful call.

required_parameters.name: make
required_parameters.description: At least 1 query parameter is required to make a successful call. For purpose of testing through the RapidAPI interface, this is required. Normally, only one of any additional query parameters is required. i.e. make, model, engineType, ...

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: The field you would like to sort by.

optional_parameters.name: order
optional_parameters.description: The sort order of the specified field.

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: The number of entries returned per query. The default is 10 per page. The max per page is 250.

optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: Over 100+ returnable fields including: make, model, year, engineType, bodyType, etc. See the Datamo website for a full list. Leave blank to return all fields.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page of data returned, starting with index 1 (Default 1)

optional_parameters.name: model
optional_parameters.description: At least 1 query parameter is required to make a successful call.

optional_parameters.name: engineType
optional_parameters.description: At least 1 query parameter is required to make a successful call.

optional_parameters.name: bodyType
optional_parameters.description: At least 1 query parameter is required to make a successful call.
